name: White Ignis
description:
White Ignis is an arcade game that takes place in an endless cave. You will face many enemies, avoid spikes and collect coins to open new skins for the character.


* Play for FREE!
* Collect coins to buy new skins for your character.
* Destroy enemies to get more coins.
* Super simple one touch game to control.
* Randomly generated landscape levels.


Your reaction is the only obstacle to new records.
